problem_text_cn: 如图,是一个圆锥形纸杯的侧面展开图,已知圆锥底面半径为5cm,母线长为15cm,那么纸杯的侧面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is an expanded figure of the lateral surface of a cone-shaped paper cup. It is known that the radius of the bottom surface of the cone is N_0 and the length of the generatrix is N_1. Then the lateral area of ​​the paper cup is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了圆锥的计算,解题的关键是弄清圆锥的侧面积的计算方法,特别是圆锥的底面周长等于圆锥的侧面扇形的弧长．
